short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides a link to Book Depository on Amazon pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Attempts to find an ISBN number in the Product details section of Amazon.com pages.
If it finds an ISBN, a link to BookDepository.com is provided.
